data.title: Hotels in Downtown Washington DC
data.meta_description: Take a short walk to the White House, Dupont Circle, Embassy Row, the Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, Georgetown & downtown Washington DCâ€™s. Click Here.
data.text: Take a short walk to The White House, Dupont Circle, Embassy Row, The Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, Georgetown and downtown Washington DC's most appealing tourist attractions and business districts. We're also within minutes of the nation's most iconic monuments and historical sites, including the Smithsonian Museums and Zoo, the Capitol Building, the Washington Monument, Arlington National Cemetery and more.
